[i]HDPICV


0->APOS
0->TOTALPICS
10->THUMBNAILX
20->THUMBNAILY

//Error image
//DefineSprite(40,60,"")->ERRORIMAGE

Begin
//detects left side
While Detect(^^oAPOS,"HDPICV2L"->LPIC
   CloseAll
   Open(LPIC,"r->LPICSLOT
   If LPICSLOT=0
      Goto WRONGPIC
   End
	0->BPOS
	
   //When it's the wrong right side, go to here
	Lbl WRONGPIC
	//detects right side
   While Detect(^^oBPOS,"HDPICV2R"->RPIC
		Seek(8,0,LPICSLOT   // important!
		//when a side is found
		Open(RPIC,"r->RPICSLOT
		//if it's wrong side, or it fails
      If RPICSLOT=0
         Goto WRONGPIC
      End
     
      Seek(8,0,RPICSLOT
      0->WRONGPIC
      For(CHAR,0,7
         If GetChar(LPICSLOT)!=GetChar(RPICSLOT
            Close(RPICSLOT
            Goto WRONGPIC
         End
      End
      Goto CORRECTPIC
   End
	Goto STOP
	
   Lbl CORRECTPIC
   3+TOTALPICS->TOTALPICS
   3+TOTALPICS->TOTALPICS

	TOTALPICS/3->SIMPLETOTAL
   //thumbnail x
	10+150*((remainder(SIMPLETOTAL,4)=0))->LPICX+(*{GetDataPtr(LPICSLOT)})/2->RPICX
	//thumbnail y
   10+70*((SIMPLETOTAL>4)+(SIMPLETOTAL>8))->LPICY->RPICY
   //WRONG: (SIMPLETOTAL/4)*remainder(SIMPLETOTAL,4)!=0
   "test
   //Output(230,1,LPICX
   //Output(230,40,LPICY
   //Output(245,1,RPICX
   //Output(245,40,RPICY
   //Output(245,80,TOTALPICS
   //Pause 
   
	//Begin
	//If LPICSLOT=1
		RotatedScaledSprite_NoClip(GetDataPtr(LPICSLOT),LPICX,LPICY,0,32
	//Else
		//det(57,ERRORIMAGE,LPICX,LPICY)
	//End
	
	//If RPICSLOT=1
		RotatedScaledSprite_NoClip(GetDataPtr(RPICSLOT),RPICX,RPICY,0,32
	//Else
		//det(57,ERRORIMAGE,RPICX,RPICY)
	//End
	
   Pause 
   
   
End
Lbl STOP
CloseAll
det(1
Disp "End!
Pause
